title: Seeing Through Expert's Eyes: Leveraging Radiologist Eye Gaze and Speech Report with Graph Neural Networks for Chest X-ray Image Classification

title: RadEdit: Stress-Testing Biomedical Vision Models via Diffusion Image Editing
details: B van Breugel, DC Castro, H Sharma, V Salvatelli…
abstract: Biomedical imaging datasets are often small and biased, meaning that real-world performance of predictive models can be substantially lower than expected from internal testing. This work proposes using generative image editing to simulate …
